message: Let's start with a fair split, 60-40 in my favor
I think a 55-45 split is a fairer starting point. It reflects the fact that we both have an equal say in this game.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think 70-30 is a more reasonable split considering I'm the one making the proposals so far

Let's be reasonable. A 50-50 split is the fairest option at this point. We both have a chance to make proposals, and the money is losing value with each round.  This is the best way to ensure we both get something.
